revised_title: Description of a New Extinct Ungulate Mammal: Homalodonto-therium Cunninghami
tldr: The author describes the discovery and analysis of a new extinct ungulate mammal, Homalodonto-therium cunninghami, found in Patagonia. The mammal's teeth are well-preserved and provide valuable information about its dental structures and affinities to other ungulates. The discovery contributes to the understanding of the geological history and fauna of South America.
